snippet: Attorney General Eric Holder is arguing publicly in favor of legal representation for migrant children arriving unaccompanied at the border — even as his department takes the opposite position in court....

headline.print_headline: Lawyers for Migrants? Administration Says Yes, No
headline.main: Lawyers for Migrants? Administration Says Yes, No

lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric Holder is arguing publicly in favor of legal representation for migrant children arriving unaccompanied at the border — even as his department takes the opposite position in court.
